    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Saving Slash](/Feats.aspx?ID=881) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 35 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Aldori Duelist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=14)

**Prerequisites**
[Aldori Duelist Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=876)

**Trigger**
An opponent critically hits you with a melee attack.

</column>

---

You quickly whirl your blade, trying to deflect enough momentum to avoid the worst of the attack. Attempt a DC 16 flat check. If you succeed, the attack becomes a normal hit, instead of a critical hit.
name: Saving Slash
